name: Mecono
description: My most ambitious project. Mecono is a hardware/protocol level project that enables P2P internet access using trustless discovery of how isolated nodes are connected and the indirect paths through the mesh between nodes.

name: Bridon Industries
description: One of my first web design contracts. Bridon Industries is a custom hydraulic solutions manufacturing company based in Shakopee, Minnesota. The project included a responsive desktop/mobile design, a few front-end scripts for the UI, and the usage of prescribed design assets.

name: SendNano
description: Nano cryptocurrency payment processor. Created as an honors CS project. Closed source.

name: Which Wallet
description: Which Wallet is a service that helps you find the perfect bitcoin wallet based on your requirements regarding security, usability, and principle. Project discontinued due to lack of donations.

name: Jottico
description: Jottico is a simple markdown-based notetaking app. Project discontinued due to lack of users.

name: Tock
description: A simple, terminal-based, clock for Linux computers written in C++ and shell.

name: Porthodlio
description: Simple, lightweight, open source Java application to track cryptocurrency assets and profits.
